biotools.summary: Fully automated service for functional annotation of prokaryotic and eukaryotic proteins of unknown function. The tool is designed to predict the functional description (DE), EC numbers and GO classes.

bioschemas.name: PANNZER
bioschemas.summary: Fully automated service for functional annotation of prokaryotic and eukaryotic proteins of unknown function. The tool is designed to predict the functional description (DE), EC numbers and GO classes.
